analysis.key_quote: This proposed rule reclassifying many federal workers turns our hardworking civil servants into political punching bags, and would make it harder for our federal government to accomplish the important objectives that citizens rely on it for.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a nonpartisan civil service and expressing concerns about the politicization of federal workers, which aligns with the themes of merit-based systems and due process protections.
